Class ClientSocketMessageGUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientSocketMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientSocketMessageGUI
public class ClientSocketMessageGUI
extends ClientSocketMessage
Cass created to manage GUI Game: interacts with BoardGUI It inherits from abstract ClientSocketMessage class

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      It initializes reading Thread from Server
      Overrides:
      initialize in class ClientSocketMessage

    • readFromServer

      public void readFromServer()
      Thread that parses input from Server. Server sends a MoveMessage in response of a PlayerMove during game, MoveMessage contains board that is scanned and if a player wins or loses quitGame method is called and this Thread ends.
      Overrides:
      readFromServer in class ClientSocketMessage

    • scanBoard

      public void scanBoard​(MoveMessage message)
      Parameters:
      message - MoveMessage from Server it scans Board received fromServer in order to show updated board on GUI each time a player makes a move

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard​(SetWorkerPosition o)
      Overrides:
      updateBoard in class ClientSocketMessage
      Parameters:
      o - Method used to setting initial worker positions

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver​(PlayerColor color)
      Parameters:
      color - Method called when game is over, It checks if this client player has won or lost and show popUp corresponding

    • gameOverStuck

      public void gameOverStuck​(PlayerColor color)
      Parameters:
      color - Method called when game is over for player stuck, It checks if player stuck is this client player or not and show popUp corresponding

    • quitGame

      public void quitGame()
      Method called at the end of a game to close connection, Thread and to close board GUI

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Returns:
      true if client is still active

    • closeOrWatchGame

      public void closeOrWatchGame()
      It is called when this player has lost and it gives the option to stay to watch the game or close the connection
